releaseNotes:
- Introduced multiple new content providers to expand movie and series availability, and many more...

Team Netra

changelog.text: Enhanced Local Files with file manager navigation for Mobile & Added Full TV Support.
Add Zip Pack support and enhance movie detail UI.
Optimize provider switching and fix race conditions in content loading.
Refactor providers, optimize scrapers, and add search filtering.
Optimize search performance and enhance history management.
